source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_SEQ_00<tab>Ingaret lets out a long, forlorn sigh.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_SEQ_00<tab>ファルコンネストのインガレットは、思い出の品を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_SEQ_01<tab>Ingaret had hoped for an opportunity to search the frozen docks near Camp Riversmeet for her grandfather's lost things, but cannot leave her post unmanned. With feral beasts prowling the docks, she cannot send just anyone to search the area in her place─she decides that you are just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> for the job. Prove her judgment sound by negotiating the wildlife and returning with her grandfather's trappings.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_SEQ_01<tab>インガレットに探し物を頼まれた。クルザス西部高地のキャンプ・リバーズミート付近で「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABB01 /var>」を3個探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_SEQ_02<tab>After scouring the docks, you find everything you can that matches Ingaret's description. Return these items to her at Falcon's Nest.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABB01 /var>をすべて見つけた。ファルコンネストの「インガレット」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABB01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_SEQ_03<tab>Ingaret thanks you for recovering her grandfather's trappings─reminders of his time as a ferryman at Riversmeet. As mementos of the duty and responsibilities he left behind when fleeing the highlands, she hopes they will help him rediscover the purpose he has lost in his life in recent years.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_SEQ_03<tab>発見した<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABB01 /var>を、インガレットに渡した。彼女の祖父はかつて船渡しをしていたが、その河ももう凍りついてしまったらしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_TODO_00<tab>Search near Camp Riversmeet for the lost items.

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_TODO_01<tab>インガレットに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ABB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_000<tab><sigh> Even if I had the time to head out there alone, if I ran afoul of those beasts, I wouldn't stand a chance...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_000はぁ、どうしよ……困ったな……。
魔物に見つかったらひとりで戦うなんて無茶だし……。
……あ、冒険者さん！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_001<tab>You see, one of the reasons I requested this posting was so I could recover my grandfather's belongings. They ought to be near the frozen docks of Camp Riversmeet.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_001実は、お爺ちゃんの思い出の品を探しに来たのですが……。
目的の場所が、かなり離れた場所にあるようなんです。
とても、私だけでは行けそうにもなくて……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_002<tab>But things being busy as they are, I'm not at liberty to leave my post at the moment. What's worse, the area is absolutely teeming with monsters, so I can't send just anyone in my stead. But you look like you could handle yourself. Might you be so kind as to help me?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_002も、もしよければ、「キャンプ・リバーズミート」付近で、
お爺ちゃんの……「」を、
探してきてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_010<tab>If you search the docks near Camp Riversmeet, you're certain to find his things.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_010も、もしよければ、「キャンプ・リバーズミート」付近で、
お爺ちゃんの……「」を、
探してきてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_020<tab>Did you find them? Did you find my grandfather's things?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_020も、もしよければ、「キャンプ・リバーズミート」付近で、
お爺ちゃんの……「」を、
探してきてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_021<tab>Oh, this looks to be everything! Halone's blessings be upon you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_021も、もう探してきてくれたんですか！？
ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_022<tab>My grandfather used to make a living as a ferryman, back before the Calamity. But what good's a ferryman when the ice is thick enough to walk across?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_022……この荷袋は、ヘミングお爺ちゃんが、
船渡しとして現役だったころ、使っていた物なんです。
今は、イシュガルドで寝たきりですけどね……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_023<tab>Little wonder that his health has gotten so much worse over the years. Aye, a man without purpose is prone to sickness. If I could but remind him of what he once had, though, maybe he'd recover...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ011_01736_INGARET_000_023もう河が凍ってしまって、
船で渡す必要もなくなっちゃったんですが、
これを見れば、昔を思い出して元気になると思うんです。
